snippet: A sixth grader from a Chicago suburb who missed six of 67 games in the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament said ESPN officials had told him he was ineligible to claim the top prize because he was not 18.
abstract: Sam Holtz, Illinois sixth grader who completed near-perfect bracket and tied for first in ESPN's NCAA men's basketball tournament contest, will be ineligible for prize due to his age; 12-year-old will miss out on $20,000 gift card and a trip to the Maui Invitational basketball tournament; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: A sixth grader from a Chicago suburb who missed six of 67 games in the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament said ESPN officials had told him he was ineligible to claim the top prize because he was not 18.

headline.main: Schoolboy Ineligible for Prize in ESPN’s Bracket Contest
